general_info.summary: Amity School of Fashion Technology hosted a talk show on "Factors Influencing Fashion" on December 9, 2022, featuring Ms. Karen Heard, International Recruitment and Development Coordinator from the University of Arts London. Ms. Heard provided students with a global perspective on the fashion industry, discussing expectations for young professionals, career and study opportunities, portfolio management, the fashion cycle, and the social and environmental impact of fashion. The event was welcomed and introduced by Prof. (Dr.) Pradeep Joshi and attended by faculty and final-year students.
